title: The Billionaire's Touch
description: After being screwed over by handsome billionaire Grant Carlson, Eve decided to take revenge. But Grant changes her mind with a simple proposition: he needs her help. Someone wants Grant dead, and Eve is the only person he trusts. Unfortunately, by helping Grant, Eve has put herself in the sights of a madman... *A hot and sexy alpha billionaire romance, perfect for fans of J.S. Scott and Hannah Ford*
author: Olivia Thorne
